# Running bind locally

    mkdir -p etc/bind
    mkdir -p opt/local/etc

    ./generate_mz.py --debug > test.mz
    ./bind_mz.py --file=test.mz --host 180.236.121.59 --debug

    cp example_named.conf etc/bind
    cp metainc.conf metaopts.conf metazone.conf etc/bind

    cp /opt/local/etc/rndc.key opt/local/etc

    sudo named -t `pwd` -u ${USER}  -c /etc/bind/example_named.conf 


allow-transfer 3600 IN TYPE42 \# 323 


allow-transfer 3600 IN TYPE42 \# 58 39313a3133322e3132332e37342e3234302f3332313a31312e3138372e3138362e3130382f3332313a3139392e3136392e33332e3231382f3332
allow-transfer 3600 IN APL 1:132.123.74.240/32 1:11.187.186.108/32 1:199.169.33.218/32
